content: Naalaam kaumaa

/Thaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, daivame! Ninakku sthuthi. Haaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, daivame! Ninakku sthuthi. Haaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa daivame! Ninakku sthuthi.
/tkarunayulllla daivame! Ninte karunayaal nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

/tnaam daivaputhranmaaraayittheeruvaan / jeevichirunnappoll namme padhippichavaraaya/ nammude pithaakkanmaare, / kurbaanakallilum praarththhanakallilum naam orkkanam. / Azhivillaattha lokamaaya svargaraajyatthil / neethimaanmaarodum punyavaanmaarodumkoode / daivaputhran avare aashvasippikkatte.
Moriyo......
132-aam masumoor
/Tsahodaranmaar otthorumichu vasikkunnathu / ethra nanmayum ethra saundaryavumaakunnu.
/tathu aharonte thalayinmelum / avante angkiyude nenchinmel veenukidakkunna thaadiyaaya avante thaadiyinmelum / olikkunna thailampoleyum / sehiyon malamel pozhiyunna hermon manyupoleyum aakunnu.
/tentennaal avide kartthaavu enneykkum anugrahattheyum jeevaneyum kalppichu.
/tdaivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam......
Eniyono
/Tdaivamaathaavinu ormmayum / avallude praarththhanayaal namukku sahaayangallum undaakatte.
/tneethimaanmaarkku ormmayum / avarude praarththhanakallaal namukku sahaayangallum undaakatte.
/tdeerghadarshimaarudeyum, shleehanmaarudeyum, sahadenmaarudeyum praarththhana / namukku kottayaayirikkatte.
/tkartthaave! Ninte sahadenmaarude thuramukhatthinum / ninte snehithanmaarude koodaarangallkkum nyangalle yogyaraakka .
/tdayayullllavanum, karuna niranyirikkunnavanumaayullllove! Ninte nyaayavisthaaradivasatthil / nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
/tthanne villikkunna paapikallilninnu / thante karunaye virodhikkaatthavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. Baarekmor.
/tshubaho… kartthaave! Vishvaasamulllla sabhayude makkallkku nalla ormma undaakkaname.
/tmenaolam… ninte shreshdhatha udikkunna divasatthil avar ninte valatthubhaagatthu nilkkumaaraakaname.
Mattoru eniyono
/Tkanyakayaaya daivamaathaave! Ellaakaalatthum / ellaanera tthum ninte praarththhana nyangallkku kottayaayirikkaname.
/t(kartthaave!) ellaanaazhikayilum / nyangallkkaayi kenikall vaykkunna / dushdane, ninte parishuddhanmaarude praarththhanayaal / nyangallil ninnu maayichukallayaname.
/tnyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! Ninte sleebaa nyangallkku kottayaayirikkukayum / athinakatthu nyangall maraykkappedukayum cheyyaname.
/tvachanamaaya yeshuthampuraane! Jeevanodirikkunnavare ninte sleebaayaal kaatthukollllukayum / marichupoyavare ninte karunayaal punyappedutthukayum cheyyaname.
/tnaam jeevanodirikkunna naall okkeyum / ellaayppozhum / pithaavineyum, puthraneyum, vishuddharoohaayeyum sthuthichu vandichu mahathvappedutthanam.
/tettavum karunayullllavanaaya nyangallude daivame! Nee ezhunnellllunna aa ninte valiya divasatthil / ninte valatthu bhaagatthu nyangalle nirutthaname.
/tee samayatthu ninakku sthuthipaaduvaan/nyangalle nee yogyaraakkiyirikkakondu / ninte raajyam anubhavippaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.
/tnyangallude maranatthinteyum jeevanteyum naathhanaaya kartthaave! Ninte krpa nyangalludemel undaayi / nyangalludeyum nyangallude marichupoyavarudeyum / aathmaakkallinmel karuna cheyyaname.
/tkartthaave! Krpacheythu sahaayikkaname.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…

/Tthrithvatthinu sthuthi / thrithvatthinu sthuthi, sthuthikkappettathum / unayaayathum aadiyum antavumillaatthathumaaya thrithvatthe nyangall sthuthikkunnu / daivame! Ellaaneratthum sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Kukkiliyonukall
(daivamaathaav)

Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall-haa...Haa....
Ninvalamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tninnazhakarachan mohippaan-haa...Haa....
/tnin janamorkkaaykku pithrgrhavum.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam...
Ekbo

Bhakthar pukazhchaa bhaajaname!
Ninniludichorekasuthan
Thrkkarall nyangallilalivaan than
Pakkalapekshayanakkenam.
Sthaumenkaalos…
(kolo-moredmsho)

Daivatthin maathaa-mariyaaminnum nibiya-
Nmaarkkum shleehanmaarkkum nal sahadenmaarkkum
Sabhayin makkallkko-kkekkum kaalam thorum
Ennekkum nallo-rormmayathundaakatte.
Baarekmor. Shubaho…

Thiruvullllatthaal ka-nyakayaam mariyaaminnull
Jaathanathaayu jaathi-kkaare vazhi neraakki,
Rakshichavall thannor-mmaykkaunnathyam cherttha
Suthanaayu sthothram, praarththhikkattavall nyangallkkaay.
Parishuddhanmaar

Nayavaan panapole thallirtthidume. Haa...Haa...
Vallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol
/tvrddhathayilumavar thallirittu thazhachidume, haa...Haa...
/tvarddhikkumavarkkuthushdi pushdikallum
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
Ekbo

Orupolingum maar (maartthomaa)
Unda melum ninnormma
Uthakaname nin praarththhana nin-
Ormmaye bahumaanichorkkaay.
Sthaumenkaalos....
Kolo (moredramsho)

Praarththhanayin samayamithallo (maartthommaa)
Pathivinpadi ninkoottatthalayaayu praarththhikka
Impamezhum nin paattil shraddhicheedum nin
Aadukalle moosheppol thrkkai vaazhtthanam.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...

Ninne varichoru thaathannum (maartthommaa)
Ninnormmaye bahumaanicha suthanum sthothram
Ninne mudi choodeedunna roohaa vandyan;
Nin praarththhana krpayettatte nyangallkkennum.
Parethar

Makkallilappan krpacheythupole-haa...Haa.....
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.
/tpullinuthulyam naranude naallkallaho-haa…uhaa…
/tpookkunnithu vayalil poochedi pole.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
Ekbo

Sharanatthaale nin krpayil
Maranamadanyoru daasare nin
Jeevasvaramathunartthaname
Kabarinnoodyaanatthinnaay
Sthaumenkaalos…
Kolo (moredu sho)

Rakshakane! Nin gaathratthe bhakshichum nin
Vilayerum rakthakkaasaa paanam cheythum
Mrtharaayore naasham neekki jeevippi-
Chaniyenam ninne nokkunnavaril kaanti.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...

Mrthare jeevippippaanezhunnallllum raajaa
Mukilazhakin melaaghoshithanaayeedunnu.
Nayavaanmaar than mun kompin naadam ketti-
Ttengkiyaninyethirelpaanaayu poyeedunnu.
Moriyo…
Maar apreminte pothuvaaya bovuso

1. Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Maathr vishuddha praarththhanayaal

2. Mariyaaminnaayu shlommo va-
Nnariyichoraa maalaakha
Daivam yojippaayennaayu
Vannarivingekeedenam.

3. Panineer haananiyaadyar mel
Veezhtthiyoraa maalaakhaa thaan
Mrthar thannasthhikkoottatthil
Krpayaam neer veezhttheedenam.

4. Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Maathr vishuddhaabhyarththhanayaal
Punyam nyangallkkum vaangi-
Ppoyorkkum nalkeedenam.
